document.full_text: hamas condemned on monday the u.s. killing of osama bin laden as the assassination of an arab holy warrior, differing sharply with the palestinian authority, the islamist group's partner in a new unity deal.
document.title: abbas government welcomes bin laden death, hamas deplores
lines_and_colors: hamas condemned on monday the u.s. killing of osama bin laden as the assassination of an arab holy warrior, differing sharply with the palestinian authority, the islamist group's partner in a new unity deal.
